data.title: The Seventh Tower : Castle (Signed by Author) by Nix, Garth: New Soft cover (2008) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780007261208 - 1st Edition - Soft cover - HarperCollins Children's Books, London - 2008 - Condition: New - No Jacket - Signed First Edition. New unblemished book. - The Seventh Tower : Castle (Signed by Author)
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Payment accepted in UK cheques, Sterling only. We accept Visa, Mastercard and American Express. We accept Paypal in UK Sterling, US Dollars and Euros.

Please telephone, fax or email orders/enquiries.

Opening hours are 8 am - 7pm Mon - Fri; 8am - 6pm Sat; Sun 10am - 5pm.

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
